path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Chronic Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Use the latest solidity version
findings.description: Using the latest solidity will prevent any compiler-level bugs.

findings.title: Make variables constant
findings.description: Few variable Values defined will be unchanged. So, please make them constant. It will save some gas.

findings.title: Spelling mistake
findings.description: There is a spelling mistake in the receive function.

findings.title: Critical operation lacks event log
findings.description: Missing event log for : deliver , removeAllFee , excludeFromFee , includeInFee , setTaxFeePercent , setBurnFeePercent , setLiquidityFeePercent , setMaxTxPercent.
findings.function: deliver, removeAllFee, excludeFromFee, includeInFee, setTaxFeePercent, setBurnFeePercent, setLiquidityFeePercent, setMaxTxPercent

findings.title: Function input parameters lack of check
findings.description: Variable validation is not performed in below functions : deliver , setMaxTxPercent , setTaxFeePercent, setBurnFeePercent , setLiquidityFeePercent , _burn.

findings.title: Centralized risk in addLiquidity
findings.description: If the private key of the owner's wallet is compromised, it will create a problem.
